question: I am a 26 year old female who is currently on medication for thyroid disease, diabetes (only taking pills, not insulin dependant), High blood pressure, and anxiety/depression.  I have been working on my weight loss for 7 years now and am getting more discouraged as time goes on.  I have tried every diet possible and am still struggling with weight loss.  I am wanting to know if taking stacker 3 (Ephedra free with Chitosam (I think that's how it's spelled)) will hurt me if I take it or have any side effects towards my other medications?  I would like to try it.  If not, can you please give me any advice as to what diet medications I can take that should definitely help me, with a good diet and exercise?  I'm lost and just looking for some good advice, as I've been struggling for WAY too long with my weight.... Please help...
title: Diet medications to use when taking other medications
